description: Try our easy to follow Apple Gravy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Gravy,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Apple Gravy Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain off pan juices from roast pork and skim off excess oil.

Mix flour with a little of the pan juices until smooth. Return to pan and cook for 1 minute. Slowly add chicken stock, stirring constantly until mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 2 minutes or until gravy thickens. Stir in apple sauce.
